name: GoogleStorage
description: Allow file storage from REDCap projects to Google Cloud

system-settings.name:
Enable Debug Logging
If you have the Stanford emLogger external module installed and configured, you can enable additional debug-level logging through this checkbox

project-settings.name:
Google Storage Service Account JSON Key contents
Copy and paste the entire contents (as JSON text) of the key file, e.g. som-rit-phi-study-name-xyz123.json

Bucket Setup
You must specify one (or more) buckets below files will be stored in the project above. In the bucket, each file will be saved in nested folders that correspond to:
{prefix}RECORD_ID/FIELD_NAME/EVENT_NAME/INSTANCE/FILE_NAME(s) where EVENT_NAME and INSTANCE are only added if needed.

sub_settings.name:
Record Name Prefix
(optional) If specified, this will be prefixed before the record_id. This does not nest the record id into a subfolder

project-settings.name: Do not display link for uploaded file.
